name: Cybertracers
description:
Cybertracers is a web local multiplayer game for 8+ players at one computer.

Game supports playing on the keyboard and gamepads.

I'm finishing it now (05/2020).
Enjoy it in the form of a progressive web application that can be installed on your computer directly from the web.

Challenge your friend in a mad duel. :)
Enjoy cybertracers. devbob.cz

Instalation:

go to 
https://cybertracers.devbob.cz/
in chrome url bar clict to + (install app).

controls:

P0 - up, down, left, right, portal: del, mines: ins, hammer: end, pause: esc
P1 - w, s, a, d, portal: q, mines: e, hammer: x, pause: esc
P2 - i, k, j, l, portal: u, mines: o, hammer: m, pause: esc
P3 - 8, 5, 4, 6, portal: 7, mines: 9, hammer: 2, pause: esc

Xbox gamepads (one,360)
move - dpad or left stick, portal: A, mines: B, hammer: X, pause: options button

Generic gamepad (not Xinput compatible)
game provide custom mapping mechanism for mapping of your gamepad.
if mapping failed clear web local storage (f12)
